activities: T&M Protection Resources, LLC (“T&M”) receives personal information pertaining to data subjects residing in the European Union (“EU”) and Switzerland. Such personal information may be received from subjects through subject’s voluntary submission of writing, electronic submission in writing or from our clients in connection with requests for background screening investigations and due diligence we provide.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: T&M collects information from and about consumers from its clients and other sources about consumers in connection with employment related due diligence.
recoursemech: For any complaints that cannot be resolved between T&M and the complainant, T&M has designated the JAMS as our independent recourse mechanism for investigation of unresolved complaints relating to our compliance with Safe Harbor Privacy Framework.
